member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.MsBuildHost.MsBuildConnectionFactory.GetEnvironmentVariablesMutator(JetBrains.ProjectModel.BuildTools.IBuildTool)
member.summary: Do not set env variables declared in toolset app.config. Otherwise MsBuild threats these env vars as Globalproperties and faild to override them from other settings e.g. toolset configuration files
